requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Something smarter than enigma
  • Graphics: Yes, you need a screen to play the game!
  • Storage: 165 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If your computer can play sound, it’s already fine.
  • Additional Notes: If your computer cannot really run this game properly, please consider changing it.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or later
  • Processor: Something smarter than enigma
  • Graphics: Yes, you need a screen to play the game!
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 143 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If your computer can play sound, it’s already fine.
  • Additional Notes: If your computer cannot really run this game properly, please consider changing it.
